description: Numbers n such that sum of the first n palindromes is a palindrome.
mathematica: palQ[n_] := Reverse[x = IntegerDigits[n]] == x; t = Select[Range[25000], palQ[#] &]; Flatten[Rest[Position[Accumulate[t], _?palQ]]] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 26 2013 *)
